allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize memory usage for parallel conformance checking

- Add __slots__ to Marking and SearchNode classes (~50% memory reduction per object)
- Implement bounded path_prefix with collapsed run representation
- Add string interning for labels to share memory across nodes
- Remove ~300 lines of broken/unused Dijkstra helper code
- Refactor worker initialization for trace-level multiprocessing
- Reduce MAX_WORKERS to 5 for n=9 experiments to prevent OOM

These changes preserve algorithmic correctness while significantly reducing
memory usage for large state spaces (n=9 training traces).

EOF

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize memory usage for tau-reachability caching

- Replace full tau-map precomputation with on-demand per-marking caching
- Add LRU-ish eviction with pinned initial marking to prevent OOM
- Use hash-based trace signatures instead of tuple keys for variant selection
- Precompute ground truth sequences once to avoid repeated DataFrame copies
- Fix dataset parallelization bug (was passing wrong data to workers)
- Add precompute_marking_transition_map parameter for user control
- Fix precompute clobbering bug when max_tau_depth wasn''t recorded
- Update GTEA experiment results

These changes significantly reduce peak memory usage for complex Petri nets
(e.g., n_train_traces=9 with 75 places/105 transitions).

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
